belongs_to_collection.name: Honto Ni Atta! Noroi no Video Collection

original_title: ほんとにあった！呪いのビデオ10
overview: 10th entry in the popular "Honto ni Atta. Noroi no Video" series. A video of the fire brigade training and a figure jumping from the roof of the building behind you...
tagline: Can you face the truth reflected by the camera?
title: Honto Ni Atta! Noroi No Video 10
